page.title: 10MR.& MRS. GRIGSON-AUTHORS.
page.content: {Mrs.Grigson}has been living in{Broad {Town}since{1956.}But her husband has been living here since{1945.}The way she started to write books was accidental she never thought of being a{writer}when she grew up. Mrs Grigson loves writing books. She writes cookery books but{Mr Grigson}writes stories and poems. We have some of {Geoffrey Grigson's}books in school: Faber Book of Popular Verse, The Shell Country Alphabet, Shapes and Adventures. Mrs. Grigson has been writing books since{1962}but her first book was published in{1967. {Mrs.Grigson's}favourite book is all about fruit.Mrs.Grigson goes on {television }but not on the radio too much .Before she goes on television she is{nervous}but she gets on alright in the end.
